name: Sniper
title: Kardel Sharpeye
lore: Kardel Sharpeye was born deep in the mountains, where his people had built their empire on a mastery of gunpowder.

shrapnel.name: Shrapnel
shrapnel.description: Fires shrapnel at an area, dealing damage over time and slowing enemies.

headshot.name: Headshot
headshot.description: Sniper's attacks have a chance to deal bonus damage and briefly slow.

takeAim.name: Take Aim
takeAim.description: Extends Sniper's attack range. Can be activated for temporary additional range.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.description: Takes aim at a target and fires a devastating shot after a short delay.

25: Headshot Applies Current Level of Shrapnel
